thread.title: Emmerdale fans in frenzy as identity of Dingle-obsessed mystery woman is finally revealed
thread.title_full: Emmerdale fans in frenzy as identity of Dingle-obsessed mystery woman is finally revealed

author: Mark Jefferies
title: Emmerdale fans in frenzy as identity of Dingle-obsessed mystery woman is finally revealed
text:
Get soaps     
Emmerdale fans were left in shock following tonight's explosive reveal. 
The mystery woman who has been secretly hiding out in the barn is Faith Dingle - aka the estranged mother of village bad boy Cain and his sister Chas. 
Viewers had been trying to guess who the glamorous stranger was all week, after she unexpectedly arrived in the village. 
She had been hiding out in the barn, with only Sarah knowing she was there until she collapsed and the paramedics had to be called in this evening's double episode. Emmerdale fans were left in shock following tonight's explosive reveal (Photo: ITV) 
Faith – who hasn’t been seen in the village for more than a decade – is now being played by Sally Dexter, one of Britain’s best stage actresses Read More Emmerdale actress Gemma Atkinson 'QUITS' ITV soap to focus on Bollywood career' 
Sally, 56, has previously won awards for her roles in musicals including Oliver and Billy Elliott, and has also starred on screen in the likes of Poldark and Holby City.
